name: copilot-debugger
description: Debug your code with GitHub Copilot

copilot-debugger.defaultLaunchConfigurat.description: Name of the default launch configuration to use when starting the debugger

languageModelTools.name: start_debugger_with_breakpoints
languageModelTools.userDescription: Start a debugging session and wait for first breakpoint with optional variable filtering and custom breakpoints.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Start a debug session using the configured default launch configuration and wait until a breakpoint is hit, returning call stack and variables (optionally filtered).

workspaceFolder.description: Absolute path of workspace folder (defaults to first workspace).

variableFilter.description: List of variable name regex fragments to filter variables (joined with |).

timeout_seconds.description: Seconds to wait for initial breakpoint (default 60).

disableExisting.description: If true, disables all existing breakpoints before adding new ones.

path.description: File path relative to workspace or absolute.

breakpoints.description: Optional list of breakpoints to add before starting session.

languageModelTools.name: resume_debug_session
languageModelTools.userDescription: Resume a paused debug session optionally waiting for the next breakpoint and applying new breakpoint configuration.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Resume execution of the specified debug session. Optionally wait for next stop and set/clear breakpoints before continuing.

sessionId.description: ID of the debug session to resume.

waitForStop.description: If true, wait until the debugger stops again before returning.

languageModelTools.name: get_variables
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get all variables from the current debug session
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Retrieve a list of all variables and their values from the current debug session when stopped at a breakpoint

languageModelTools.name: expand_variable
languageModelTools.userDescription: Show detailed contents and immediate children of a specific variable
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Expand a specific variable to show its detailed contents and immediate child properties/elements when stopped at a breakpoint

variableName.description: Name of the variable to expand
